????


"I'm a femme, haven't you noticed it??"said with a coquery smile the 
femme while she left the pod and revelealed her body and face: Her 
metallik skin mixed blue and silver. She has a silver, oval face, her 
head was wearing a bejewelled herlmet. Her lips were tin and 
delicates. Her eyes were blue and with an exotic spark. She seemed to 
be delicate and strong at time. From hers back emerge two deep blue 
bat-like wings and three dragon's head.
